item.title: Bachelor Project
item.description:
Active calibration of bio-mimetic tactile sensors on robotic hand

Tactile sensors measure information arising from physical contact with theenvironment and are generally modelled after the biologicalsense of cutaneous touch, that are crucial for many microtasks, such as in-hand manipulation. In this project, we propose a method to actively calibrate the BioTac sensors embedded on the fingertips of a Shadow Dexterous robotic Hand.

Supervisors:

  • Andrea Cherubini; Associate Professor, Laboratoire d’Informatique, de Robotique et de Micro√©lectronique de Montpellier (LIRMM)
